thread.title: BRIEF-‍Fitch: Failure Of Latvia's Third-Largest Bank Does Not Appear To Jeopardise Country's Sovereign Credit Fundamentals​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Fitch: Failure Of Latvia's Third-Largest Bank Does Not Appear To Jeopardise Country's Sovereign Credit Fundamentals​
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Fitch:‍
* FITCH SAYS FAILURE OF LATVIA‘S THIRD-LARGEST BANK “DOES NOT APPEAR TO JEOPARDISE” COUNTRY‘S SOVEREIGN CREDIT FUNDAMENTALS​
* ‍FITCH SAYS EARLY SIGNS OF THE BANK FALLOUT ARE THAT DEPOSIT FLIGHT HAS NOT SPREAD TO OTHER BANKS OF LATVIA​
* ‍FITCH SAYS IT DOES NOT EXPECT ABLV‘S FAILURE TO AFFECT GOVERNMENT FINANCES MATERIALLY​ Source text for Eikon: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
